mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 83 shows rice fields along a dirt road with telephone poles leading to the town of Crowley in the distance. Probable Rice Experiment Station in Crowley, Louisiana.
mods.note: Compare photograph to the following publication. Stubbs, W.C. (1900) Rice. Louisiana Bulletin, No. 61, pp. 371-436.
